about_the_game:
PRESENTATION


This is a classic 2D RPG in the style of Valiant: Resurrection and Aveyond.

Captain John Winters and his brother Knox Winters have been raised by the seas.
Being it the only place they could ever call home, they became masters of it. As pirates, they have faced many adventures and challenges, but the biggest one is yet to come.

Hestia, John's wife, is a powerful witch who has come upon the whereabouts of the Castaway List, a map created by the Sea Lords that not only charts all of the seven seas, but also all the treasures to be found on them.

There is wealth, power and knowledge to be gained from the list. In a world that faces poverty, famine and disease, which of the three treasures holds priority?

FEATURES


* A touching story that covers love, brotherhood and betrayal
* Freedom to sail through the seven seas at will
* A variety of locations to explore, from snowlands, to deserts, forests, caves and mountains
* Many challenges and enemies to overcome throughout the adventure
* Mouse Support
* 15 to 20 hours of gameplay
